verses.roman:
yadyapi kevala tāṅra krīḍā-mātra dharma
tathāpi jīvere kṛpāya kare eka karma

synonyms: yadyapi—although; kevala—only; tāṅra—His; krīḍā-mātra—pastime only; dharma—characteristic function; tathāpi—still; jīvere—to the fallen souls; kṛpāya—by the causeless mercy; kare—does; eka—one; karma—activity.
translation: Although His pastimes are His only characteristic functions, by His causeless mercy He performs one activity for the fallen souls.
